TopicTitle: Kraken striked on early career mode

Articles.Content:
So, I was in an early career mode, with jeb flying a craft called "IDIOT II" (because the engineers that designed it were idiots, as you will see soon) as it reached the upper atmosphere, I went on IVA and got out, but this happened:

The kraken removed 2 side panels from the pod, leaving jeb exposed to decompression and low oxygen levels . Luckily he survived to pilot "IDIOT III" and see Valentina again.
